required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anlotinib Plus Anti-PD-1 Antibody AK105 for Advanced Pancreatic Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Anlotinib Plus Anti-PD-1 Antibody AK105 as Third or More-line Therapy for Advanced Pancreatic Cancer: a Prospective, Single-arm, Open-label, Pilot Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study was designed to explore the clinical efficacy of Anlotinib combined with Anti-PD-1 antibody AK105 in the treatment of third- and above -line advanced pancreatic cancer patients, in order to find a better therapy strategy for pancreatic cancer patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Disease control rate (DCR) based on RECIST v. 1 1
primary_outcome.description: Disease control rate (DCR) based on RECIST v. 1 1 by investigators

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate (ORR) based on RECIST V. 1.1
secondary_outcome.description: Objective response rate (ORR) based on RECIST V. 1.1 by investigators

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression free survival (PFS) measured from the date of anlotinib plus AK105 initiation to the time of progression
secondary_outcome.description: Progression free survival (PFS) measured from the date of anlotinib plus AK105 initiation to the time of progression by investigators assessment

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival (OS) measured from the date of anlotinib plus AK105 initiation to the time of death of any cause
secondary_outcome.description: Overall survival (OS) measured from the date of anlotinib plus AK105 initiation to the time of death of any cause by investigators assessment

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0
secondary_outcome.description: adverse events assessed using the National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (version 4.0).

intervention.description: Anlotinib： a multi-kinase inhibitor AK105： an anti-PD-1 antibody

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- locally advanced or metastatic pancreatic cancer (PC),
- histologically or cytologically proven diagnosis of adenocarcinoma or adenosquamous carcinoma,
- failed to second-line chemotherapy for PC,
- 18-75 years of age,
- an Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status score of 0 to 1,
- adequate organ functions
Exclusion Criteria:
- had received PD 1 /CTLA 4 antibody treatment
- had received anti-VEGFR inhibitors or antibodies

facility.name: Department of Medical Oncology, Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
